nodes.text: Galactic Gazetteer: Hoth and the Greater Javin

Galactic Gazetteer: Hoth and the Greater Javin is a Galactic Gazetteer web supplement on Wizards of the Coast's website. It was written by Craig Robert Carey, Jason Fry, and Daniel Wallace and published online March 25, 2004.
This supplement to the Star Wars Roleplaying Game details the Yarith, Anoat, and Javin sectors.
